programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Binky Show; Keeping Cool; Don't Move
programme.desc: Garfield goes on a TV game show to win money to buy Jon a birthday present; Odie gets caught by the dog catcher after Garfield tells him not to move.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Magic Mutt; Short Story; Monday Misery
programme.desc: Jon is asked to perform a magic show at a children's hospital; to avoid Monday, Garfield mails himself to Samoa.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Best of Breed; National Tapioca Pudding Day; All About Odie
programme.desc: Garfield enters a cat talent show; Garfield produces a documentary film about Odie.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Caped Avenger; Shy Fly Guy; Green Thumbs Down
programme.desc: Garfield's alter ego searches for missing Pooky; Jon decides he should grow his own food in a garden after seeing their high grocery bills.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Garfield's Forget-Me-Not; I Like Having You Around; Sales Resistance
programme.desc: Garfield suffers amnesia after being hit in the head with a pie tin; Garfield battles a pesky salesman.

programme.desc: Jon buys a man-eating fern; Orson looks for a record player; Jon wants Garfield to hide his little black book.
